fullDescription.intro: This node inverts the transformation applied by the PCA Apply node. Given data in the space resulting from the PCA reduction is transformed back to its original space. Information that was lost in the PCA reduction can of course not be recovered.

option.name: fail if missing values are encountered

fullDescription.option: If checked, execution fails if the selected columns contain missing values. By default rows containing missing values are ignored.
If checked, the pca columns are removed in the output table.
Select all columns containing the principal components of the original data. Usually the default selection should capture all of these.

ports.outPort: Model with projection to principal components
